reviews.review: fun if you like story games. i like it it kept me addicted for three months
Best game ever made, incredible physics, extraordinary comedy and a lot of irony.
Definitely one of my top favorite PC games. ever.
I can just say - I LOVE THIS GAME! If you want to solve puzzles with your friend and enjoy every bit of doing it this is the game for you. Fun, engaging and great to play with your friends!
MT BOM EU AMO DEMAIS ESSE JOGO VOU CHORAAA
Podobało mi sie granie, nie podobała mi sie moja karta graficzna i wciąż mi się nie podoba
un classique, un jeu à ne pas rater, que je recommande vivement
Great game to play with friends. Play the first one before this though because the story is very intriguing. Great song at the end too!
好玩好玩好玩好玩好玩好玩好玩好玩好玩好玩
best sequal ever for a game.
Мне в этой игре понравилось буквально всё!
It's a pretty good game, and yes, I know  the first game was entirely  about puzzles, this actually has a storyl line that's not about puzzles.
Good multiplayer and the story is pretty fun too.
역시 잘만든 퍼즐게임, 어릴적에 1을 해보고 30대에 2를 했지만, 여전한 갓겜이었다.
Игра крутая, вулве маладец, критику не хочу писать. Хачу халву 3 ._.

Amazing game, great graphics, wonderful story line and lore! Even though it came out years ago it is still a great game and anyone who has not played this game, you should! Worth the money, but but portal first and play them in order for the story to make a little more seance.
o melhor investimento q vc pode fazer em algo de 2011,eu te prometo!!!!!!!!

Lustig gemacht und man muss seinen Grips anstellen. Mal was anderes als nur Ballern & Co. Was aber auch Spaß macht. Ich Spiele es gerne. Und wenn mal eine Lösung nicht sofort Parat ist, Später noch mal Probieren. Bis jetzt waren alle Rätsel Lösbar. Ich würde das Game auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen. 5 Sterne von mir. Ganz klar.

Played it through on console more times than I can actually count. Got it for pc. No regrets.

优秀的剧情体验，打完让我有点恋恋不舍
great game! but i get stuck A LOT

Достаточно хорошая, интеллектуальная игра, чтобы развить свои мозги. Конечно бывают уровни, в которых нужно огромное время втуплять, но это не для меня. И не жалко ни каких 400 руб. за эту игру, каждый должен сыграть в неё хоть один раз в жизни, каждый!
Балдежная игра для игры одному или игры с друзьями в коопе
its one of the best games i have ever played and i would reccomend this

My personal favorite game the music the level design the graphics and chambers, characters and humor all come together to form this great atmosphere especially in the underground part

it says i only have 4 hours on here but god knows how many times ive played this on xbox
прикольая графика и само прохождение прикольное я Half-life 2 7 раз проходил и не надоело  как и Portal 2  4 раза проходил и не надоело
Great Story, quirky atmosphere. Even replaying the game is still enjoyable with how many little details are here and there. Community test rooms allow for more portal fun and a lot more content.
Wonderful game full of humor, and thought evoking puzzles! Highly recommend.

Muy buen juego, muy recomendable, si te gusto el 1 este te va a encantar, mas largo, con mejores fisicas y mas divertido, incluso si no te gustan los juegos de puzzles como a mi, este  juego casi seguro te va a encantar. Ademas de ser un juego casi infinito, entre la campaña solitario, la cooperativa y los mapas echos por la comunidad es básicamente un juego infinito.
One heck of an AMAZING game! Very interestong physics and Quite the adventure!
Easily the best game I've ever played.  Mentally challenging, hours of fun, and keeps you laughing the whole time.
Portal 2 is the Perfect 2nd Game. It added to the story, Graphics are greatly improved and overall its a longer game. The game adds lots of new content that fits into the Portal World.

This is possibly the best games ive ever played. It knows when to do the puzzles and when to do the story based exploration perfectly. The atmosphere is way better than portal 1. This whole game is better than portal 1 which is a fantastic game. I think its the best game I have ever played.
This is one of the greatest PC game I've ever played. Technically Portal was the reason I am into PC gaming and introduction to Valve, I love this game and I guarantee you´ll love it too :)
Really a brilliant game, even in 2020
Literally my favorite game of all time. I LOVE this game.
My personal favorite game of all time
Es de los mejores juegos de rompecabezas que he jugado, atmosférico, buena trama y plataformeo satisfactorio.

топ игра уже прошол где-то 5 раз но недавно купил в стиме 
очень слишком отличается от пиратки
i played it a little a few years ago, it's ok

Semplicemente uno dei giochi migliori che abbia mai giocato, se non lo avete giocato, o non lo avete finito, semplicemente, fatelo... Ah, piccolo consiglio, ascoltate sempre i dialoghi, sono fatti veramente bene
